pages.title: Signal Tablet
pages.text: A handheld $(thing)signal diagnostic tool$() for debugging your train network. Shows real-time signal states, train positions, and track observer data in a portable display.$(br2)No peripheral API â€” this is a handheld item.
Hold in hand and right-click to open the diagnostic display.

pages.title: Using the Tablet
pages.text: $(bold)Features:$()$(br)$(li)View all signal states at a glance$(br)$(li)See which trains occupy which track segments$(br)$(li)Monitor track observer activation$(br)$(li)Diagnose signal conflicts$(br)$(li)Identify derailed trains$(br2)The Signal Tablet provides the same network data as the Train Controller peripheral but in a visual handheld format, useful for walking around your rail network and checking signal states.
